categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Beraxil  was a female Human Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3637 BBY she was on Ziost when former Sith Emperor Vitiate came to the world and possessed many of the Imperials on the planet, turning them into his puppets to murder civilians. Beraxil was among those who fell under his control and she was killed during the fighting.
Lord Beraxil was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan in game update 3.2.
